channel.title: Military Spouse Talk Radio
channel.description: Military Spouse Talk Radio is an upbeat information packed 30 minute talk show Podcast, covering topics that are timely and relevant to all military spouses.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Sharing our stories, Up Close and Personal
channel.itunes:summary: Victoria M. Parham is host of Military Spouse Talk Radio, an upbeat information packed 30 minute talk show covering topics that are timely and relevant to all military spouses.
channel.itunes:author: Victoria M. Parham
channel.itunes:keywords: military spouse, army wife, navy spouse, air force spouse, marine corps wife, military podcasts, victoria parham, victoria m. parham, portable careers, military careers, military families
